options.content: Security Dashboard CI

value.title: click here to see more details

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    severity_levels.severity AS severity,
    COALESCE(findings_data.severity_count, 0) AS severity_count
FROM 
    (
        SELECT 'High' AS severity UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Medium' UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Low' UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Info' UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Total'
    ) AS severity_levels
LEFT JOIN 
    (
        SELECT 
            f.severity AS severity, 
            COUNT(*) AS severity_count 
        FROM 
            findings f 
        JOIN 
            builds b ON f.build_id = b.id 
        WHERE 
            b.app = '${AppName}'
            AND b.build_number = '${ScanName}' 
            AND f.severity IN (${severity}) 
            AND b.module = '${repo_name}'  
			AND f.is_new IN (${New}) 
            AND f.suppressed IN (${Suppressed})
        GROUP BY 
            f.severity
        
        UNION ALL
        
        SELECT 
            'Total' AS severity, 
            COUNT(*) AS severity_count
        FROM 
            findings f 
        JOIN 
            builds b ON f.build_id = b.id 
        WHERE 
            b.app = '${AppName}'
            AND b.build_number = '${ScanName}' 
            AND f.severity IN (${severity}) 
            AND b.module = '${repo_name}' 
            AND f.is_new IN (${New}) 
            AND f.suppressed IN (${Suppressed})
    ) AS findings_data ON severity_levels.severity = findings_data.severity
ORDER BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN severity_levels.severity = 'High' THEN 1 
        WHEN severity_levels.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 
        WHEN severity_levels.severity = 'Low' THEN 3
        WHEN severity_levels.severity = 'Info' THEN 4 
        WHEN severity_levels.severity = 'Total' THEN 5
        ELSE 6
    END;

SELECT 
    severity_levels.severity AS severity,
    COALESCE(findings_data.severity_count, 0) AS severity_count
FROM 
    (
        SELECT 'High' AS severity UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Medium' UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Low' UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Info' UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Total'
    ) AS severity_levels
LEFT JOIN 
    (
        SELECT 
            f.severity AS severity, 
            COUNT(*) AS severity_count 
        FROM 
            findings f 
        JOIN 
            builds b ON f.build_id = b.id 
        WHERE 
            b.build_number = '${ScanName}' 
            AND f.severity IN (${severity}) 
            AND f.toolname IN ('Dependency Check Scan') 
            AND b.module = '${repo_name}' 
			AND f.is_new IN (${New}) 
            AND f.suppressed IN (${Suppressed})
        GROUP BY 
            f.severity
        
        UNION ALL
        
        SELECT

        FROM

        JOIN 
            builds b ON f.build_id = b.id 
        WHERE 
            b.build_number = '${ScanName}' 
            AND f.severity IN (${severity}) 
            AND f.toolname IN ('Dependency Check Scan')

			AND f.is_new IN (${New})

ORDER BY 
    CASE

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT module FROM builds where app = '${AppName}'
list.label: Repository
list.name: repo_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT module FROM builds where app = '${AppName}'

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT build_number 
FROM builds 
WHERE build_number LIKE 'CI_%'
AND app = '${AppName}'
ORDER BY build_number DESC 
LIMIT 10;
list.label: Scan Name
list.name: ScanName
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT build_number 
FROM builds 
WHERE build_number LIKE 'CI_%'
AND app = '${AppName}'
ORDER BY build_number DESC 
LIMIT 10;

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT severity AS severity
FROM findings;
list.label: Severity
list.name: severity
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT severity AS severity
FROM findings;
